page.title: 19LIFE STYLES CONTINUED
page.content: The most popular leisure activity is gardening, followed by listening to music, reading and watching television. Of those interested, more people participated in sailing than any other sport. Although more people play squash than soccer, more people go to football matches than any other sporting event. People prefer to watch tennis and athletics on television. Most people take an annual holiday, usually in August. A significant number of people take sailing holidays, some of them cruising in their own boats. Most people travel by car to their holiday destination, but more people use a yacht than a coach.
